WorkItem.Description: When I put AoE uptime to 1, the dps of Living Bomb doesn't change, nor does FBLBPyro rotation. Instead, Rawr starts to recommend that I spam Dragon's Breath for the whole fight, even though my Blast Wave + free Flamestrike would be superior damage if used on CD. Also, Living Bomb is shown on the cycles list as having high dps (for me it's like 19kdps), which I suspect is because Rawr is calculating average damage per single GCD, as opposed to looking at it over the full duration.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Mage] Setting AoE only affects Dragon's Breath

Comments.Message: You're completely correct. Aoe model needs a complete overhaul at some point and other than looking at spell details for aoe spells isn't really useful at the moment.
Marking this as a Feature Request for true AoE support.
